product_name: Platypus SoftBottle Water Bottle - 17 fl. oz.
long_description: Flexible, lightweight and durable, the 17 fl. oz. Platypus SoftBottle(TM) water bottle can be stored in spaces that won't fit rigid water bottles. 80% lighter than standard hard-plastic bottles, it takes more than 5 Platypus SoftBottles to equal the weight of one 1-liter, hard-plastic bottle. Compact and flexible design can be flattened when empty and rolled up to fit practically anywhere in your pack. Platypus SoftBottle(TM) water bottle is sized to fit in a drink holder, round pocket, square pocket or in your hand. Food-grade polyethylene lining ensures bottle won't retain flavors or taste like plastic; plus, it's 100% BPA free. Includes a screw-on closure cap.
